abstract: There will be five sponsors for the third annual Shorty Awards, which honor communication on Facebook, Twitter and in other social media, to be presented on March 28 in New York.
snippet: There will be five sponsors for the third annual Shorty Awards, which honor communication on Facebook, Twitter and in other social media, to be presented on March 28 in New York.
lead_paragraph: For several years, advertising awards shows have been starting to sign sponsors to underwrite the general bestowing of honors or, in several instances, present specific awards that are created on behalf of the sponsors. That is also the case for a newcomer in the kudos field, the Shorty Awards, which honor communication on Facebook, Twitter and in other social media.
